list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a liquid) be turned into ice or another solid as a result of extreme cold.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in the winter the milk froze
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vào mùa đông, sữa bị đóng băng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: store (something) at a very low temperature in order to preserve it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bánh có thể bị đóng băng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: become suddenly motionless or paralyzed with fear or shock.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Mathewson froze on the spot, unable to take the next step
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mathewson froze tại chỗ, không thể thực hiện bước tiếp theo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: hold (something) at a fixed level or in a fixed state for a period of time.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: new spending on defense was to be frozen
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chi tiêu mới cho phòng thủ là đông lạnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of holding or being held at a fixed level or in a fixed state.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Công nhân phải đối mặt với một khoản đóng băng lương

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a period of frost or very cold weather.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the big freeze surprised the weathermen
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Freeze lớn ngạc nhiên về thời tiết
